translation.Name: Easter Note - Breaking News
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: Plate activity has been detected under the island of Easter Island. Scientists are unsure of what is causing this sudden and extreme activity. All that is known is that there's a good chance that a number of the now-extinct volcanoes on the island may wake up in the coming weeks. If you live near any of the Volcanoes, evacuate while you still can.
